General.Name: IwToken
General.Description: IwToken is an ecosystem that contains an integrative wallet, multiwallet, an AMT network and a debit card, the integrative card, which will be connected to each users' wallet. IwToken plans to integrate cryptocurrencies to the everyday life of the user, making it easy for one to buy, sell and spend crypto at will. The IWT tokens represent a share of the company create and allow holders to receive payouts from the profits generated.

ICO.Description:
IwToken is an ecosystem that contains an integrative wallet, multiwallet, an AMT network and a debit card, the integrative card, which will be connected to each users' wallet. IwToken plans to integrate cryptocurrencies to the everyday life of the user, making it easy for one to buy, sell and spend crypto at will. The IWT tokens represent a share of the company create and allow holders to receive payouts from the profits generated.

Team:

  • Franco Leonel: Founder and Developer 
  • Remedios Gonzalez: Project Manager 
  • Maximiliano de Muro: Business Advisor 
  • Tatiana de Rossi: Legal Advisor

IwToken will be holding its ICO on the 21st of August, 2107. The ICO token supply represents 45% of the total 100m supply. The starting price is 0.00083 ETH per token and there is a funding cap of 12,500,000 USD. The ICO is expected to run until the 28th of September or until the cap is reached, whichever comes first. 

Token Reserve Split (XX%):

  • 25% Rewards program
  • 30% Held at a safe account

The IWT ICO features a bonus campaign:

Bonus Structure:

  • Week 1: 1 ETH = 1200 IWT
  • Week 2: 1 ETH = 1000 IWT 
  • Week 3: 1 ETH = 800 IWT 
  • Week 4: 1 ETH = 600 IWT
